Summary: light with giant fireball appears to enter atmosphere than disappears over LA
divs: sighting detailsnephew shouts out to me loudly.. uncle look, whats that over there. i ran out to see what the heck he's yelling about and he point to the northern sky. we are staring at a light coming in from the north but also with a huge orange flame coming from it, but the flames appeared to be almost like an object entering the atmosphere, almost heart shape. this went on for a good minute maybe even 2 than the flame died out but we could clearly see the the light still heading south for about 15 secs and than it turned east for another 2 minutes than went it seemed like it just went outside the atmosphere, it just disappeared. i couldn't explain it but it freak the hell out me. there were at least 4 large planes in formation to land at lax coming in from east to west and i know the 1st and 2nd must of had a clear view of the orange\red flame also i could clearly see the blinking safety lights on all four incoming planes but the object had blinking lights. i know others saw what i saw.
